content:
Hi @Larry Decelles, have the Da Vinci Burden Reduction track kick off and sessions been updated to WHOVA?
I'm not seeing a track for Da Vinci Burden Reduction :unamused:
image.png

I'm just trying to repeat the first step of this morning's demo and I'm getting this CORS error from the crd-request-generator page:
Access to fetch at 'https://auth.logicahealth.org/token/realms/ClientFhirServer/protocol/openid-connect/token' from origin 'https://davinci-crd-request-generator.logicahealth.org' has been blocked by CORS policy: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. If an opaque response serves your needs, set the request's mode to 'no-cors' to fetch the resource with CORS disabled.
Do I need to tell Chrome to ignore CORS?

This turned out to be operator error: I had selected a patient but forgot to also select a Device Request and the web app was not happy with that. There was no user-visible error report but that's expected from a demo app.
